description: True NYC space economy living! One room has Full Sized Loft Bed and mini-Twin below. The other room has a couch. Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. 2 Blocks to A or 1 subway trains, 30 mins from Times Square. 24 hours open grocery store and laundromat. View of the beautiful Fort Tryon Park across the street
name: Onebedroom apartment with park view
